div1.head: *eu)staqi/w| filoso/fw| pro\s *eu)sta/qion presbu/teron *)antioxei/as A, B; pro\s *eu)sta/qion filo/sofon a)po\ *)antioxei/as pro\ tou= presbu/teron katastaqh=nai C, D, G; *eu)staqi/w| filoso/fw| *)antioxei/as peri\ tou= presbuteri/ou F. According to the Benedictines none of these titles is possible because Eustathius sas not a presbyter, but a heathen, as is indicated by Basil's sords: Is not all this the hand of Fate, as you yourself sould say, and the sork of Necessity?
